data.expected_result: It shouldn't cut off, when there's a lot of space left.
data.short_description: When you add all 9 users into a Group DM, "the selected users will fill" cuts off, when there's enough space for it to not cut.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Friends, and head to Group DM creation. - Select random 9 users, then notice the "The selected users will fill...".
